body: When striking one opponent, you catch its ally off guard.
name: Surprise Follow-Through
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/New Racial Rules/Half-Orc Feats/Surprise Follow-Through

sections.body: Str 13, Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When using Cleave or Great Cleave, the second foe you attack on your turn is denied its Dexterity bonus against you.
